data.meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
data.sentence: The word الْأُخْرَى comes from the root ا خ ر and is associated with the meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.

data.meanings: To try or to prove someone, to mediate, to wish or desire.
data.sentence: The word وَمَنَوةَ comes from the root م ن ي and is associated with the meanings: To try or to prove someone, to mediate, to wish or desire.

data.meanings: to make a third part of a thing, one third, by threes.
data.sentence: The word الثَّالِثَةَ comes from the root ث ل ث and is associated with the meanings: to make a third part of a thing, one third, by threes.
